entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY , Westport
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 12:06 PM EST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mostly Cloudy, 1.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Kingston Airport 1:00 PM EST Saturday 28 January 2023
Condition: Mostly Cloudy
Temperature: 1.4°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.1 kPa rising
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 59 %
Dewpoint: -5.7°C
Wind: W 19 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. Temperature falling to minus 3 this afternoon. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries early this afternoon. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 70. Temperature falling to minus 3 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 5 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of snow. Temperature steady near minus 5.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Periods of snow beginning after midnight. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h overnight. Temperature steady near minus 5. Wind chill minus 4 this evening and minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Periods of snow. Temperature steady near minus 4.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Amount 5 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 4. Wind chill near minus 11. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Saturday 28 January 2023
